New Records: Jackson Chourio hit a 398-foot home run in the eighth inning.
Garrett Mitchell hit a two-run home run in the eighth inning.
Key Match Events: Jackson Chourio tied the game with a lead-off home run in the eighth inning.
Garrett Mitchell's two-run home run gave the Brewers the lead in the eighth inning.
The Mets struggled to convert base runners into runs and had defensive miscues.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Mets and Brewers were set for a decisive Game 3 after the series was tied 1-1.
The Mets had 15 hits and 9 walks in the series but struggled to score runs.
